Body: I installed cyanogen mode. I downloaded the zip here http://download.crpalmer.org/nightlies/Z00A/At first I didn't do factory reset. Now I wiped everythinghttp://www.technobuzz.net/guide-to-install-cyanogenmod-cm-12-1-on-asus-zenfone-2/Curiously sdcard cannot be mounted. So I install cyanogenmod from external SDThe problem isCM says installation complete.Yet, if I reboot, Asus logo still show up. Except that now it's not going to normal boot. It goes to bootloader and that's it.Update:I am able to reflash ASUS original firmware and it works.So the issue is not on my ZenFone 2However, others have succesfully install cyanogen on Asus Zenfone2. So the issue is not that cyanogen doesn't work on asus zenfone2.I tried installing so many other custom mod. All fails.
Title: After I install custom mod zenfone 2reboot to fast boot

history.Text: I installed cyanogen mode. I downloaded the zip here http://download.crpalmer.org/nightlies/Z00A/At first I didn't do factory reset. Now I wiped everythinghttp://www.technobuzz.net/guide-to-install-cyanogenmod-cm-12-1-on-asus-zenfone-2/Curiously sdcard cannot be mounted. So I install cyanogenmod from external SDThe problem isCM says installation complete.Yet, if I reboot, Asus logo still show up. Except that now it's not going to normal boot. It goes to bootloader and that's it.
After I install cyanogen mod the phone doesn't work

I installed cyanogen mode. I downloaded the zip here http://download.crpalmer.org/nightlies/Z00A/At first I didn't do factory reset. Now I wiped everythinghttp://www.technobuzz.net/guide-to-install-cyanogenmod-cm-12-1-on-asus-zenfone-2/Curiously sdcard cannot be mounted. So I install cyanogenmod from external SDThe problem isCM says installation complete.Yet, if I reboot, Asus logo still show up. Except that now it's not going to normal boot. It goes to bootloader and that's it.Update:I am able to reflash ASUS original firmware and it works.So the issue is not on my ZenFone 2However, others have succesfully install cyanogen on Asus Zenfone2. So the issue is not that cyanogen doesn't work on asus zenfone2.I tried installing so many other custom mod. All fails.
After I install custom mod zenfone 2reboot to fast boot
